title: Your FASTag will be deactivated if you don't do this by January 31
description: If your KYC is not complete, then even valid balance will not save your FASTag from being blacklisted or deactivated by your bank. The process will start from January 31. So, get your KYC fully done on or before the last day of the current month.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
